S

semaphore - package semaphore
Various semaphore implementations.
Semaphore - Class in semaphore
A local Semaphore class.
Semaphore(String, int, int) - Constructor for class semaphore.Semaphore
A generic constructor, with a limit value for bounded semaphores.
Semaphore(String, int) - Constructor for class semaphore.Semaphore
A semaphore with no (explict) upper limit.
SemaphoreError - Exception in semaphore
Report bounded semaphores exceeding their limits.
SemaphoreError(SemaphoreInterface) - Constructor for exception semaphore.SemaphoreError
 
SemaphoreError(String) - Constructor for exception semaphore.SemaphoreError
 
SemaphoreInterface - Interface in semaphore
A semaphore interface that matches the method names used in the lecture.
setDelay(double) - Method in class boundedBuffer.Consumer
Set the delay for this consumer.
setDelay(double) - Method in class boundedBuffer.Producer
Set the delay for this producer.
SLOW - Static variable in class boundedBuffer.BufferSystem
Predefined delay constant.
